name: 品牌管理
description: The objective of this course aims at delivering fundamental concepts and real world cases in brand management. Essential concepts in branding and brand management, such as equity and positioning, will be emphasized. Taking the brand equity as the core concept, the course contents evolves around brand equity and discuss how equity is built, measured, and managed.
goals: Understand brand management planning and execution procedures
Understand the importance of brand management to a business
Procedures for International Brand Management Planning
Train teamwork ability to complete brand management planning
